title: Hatharaliyadda Town Development Programme - Construction of Multi Purpose Hall
decision_details: - the proposal made by H.E. the President, in his capacity as the Minister of Defence and Urban Development, to construct a multi-purpose hall in an identified block of land under  the Hatharaliyadda Town Development Programme and to entrust the work to the Central Engineering Consultancy Bureau (CECB) at a cost of Rs.170 million, was approved by the Cabinet.
